content.raw:
Could you post an example of what upgrading an URDF to SDFormat looks like? \(Or perhaps re-saving an SDFormat?\)

Expectation is that `//pose[@frame]` would be empty, but it’s unclear how `GetSet()` will interact with parsing? \(will parsing with conversion / upgrades correctly not trigger it?\)
content.html:
Could you post an example of what upgrading an URDF to SDFormat looks like? (Or perhaps re-saving an SDFormat?)

Expectation is that //pose[@frame] would be empty, but it’s unclear how GetSet() will interact with parsing? (will parsing with conversion / upgrades correctly not trigger it?)
